Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1969...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1972, off Dwight Siebler (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1972, off Jesse Hickman (LA)...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 6/16/1982 (Going to CHC: P F. LaCorte. Going to CHW: CF D. Evans)...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/15/1984 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Chicago (N) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF D. Evans. Going to CHW: 1B C. Quintana)...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/11/1987, off Bryan Harvey (ATL)...
Released by Chicago (N) on 7/7/1989...
